title: Secret Recipe
description: The Printing Factory has a secret recipe which makes a rare vanilla item, is it right that it goes on the page or stays secret?

replies.body: I think Greg should be the authority on this. We can easily include it, but if we do, it should be a riddle of some kind, unless we have permission from Greg to just post it.
The wiki should not be intentionally leaving information out. Put it in unless greg explicitly says to remove it.
I'll add it when I do the rest of the recipes (soon) and unless Greg says otherwise the secret will be secret no more :)
